item.title: 泰国在市场改革中放宽首次公开募股和外资上市规则
item.description: 泰国计划简化股票上市程序，以此作为加强资本市场竞争力和吸引全球投资者的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Thailand plans to simplify stock-listing procedures as part of a broader drive to strengthen capital market competitiveness and attract global investors.】

item.title: 即使上市股票摇摆不定，10 月份印度首次公开募股仍可能达到创纪录的 50 亿美元
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 自由港称泥石流又造成五名格拉斯贝格工人死亡
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc. said it found five more workers dead at the Grasberg copper mine in eastern Indonesia, following a mud flow that has halted production.】

item.title: 交易商关注美联储利率和矿山产出，铜价扩大涨幅
item.description: 在创下一年来最大单周涨幅之后，铜价延续涨势，原因是投资者密切关注美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）降息和供应中断的前景。【原文：Copper extended gains after the biggest weekly advance in a year, as investors honed in on the outlook for interest-rate cuts by the US Federal Reserve and disruptions to supply.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普加征关税，越南制造业仍加速增长
item.description: 越南第三季度的经济增长速度超过预期，制造业和商业活动为经济抵御 8 月初生效的更高关税起到了缓冲作用。【原文：Vietnam’s economic growth accelerated more than expected in the third quarter, with manufacturing and business activity cushioning the economy against higher tariffs that took effect early August.】

item.title: 据说奥勒留正在酝酿出售前汉莎航空餐饮部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Aurelius 正在探讨出售 LSG 集团的亚太地区航空配餐业务。【原文：Private equity firm Aurelius is exploring a sale of LSG Group’s Asia Pacific airline catering business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 菲律宾交易所首席执行官称贪污丑闻可能进一步拖累股市
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所总裁兼首席执行官拉蒙-蒙松（Ramon Monzon）表示，围绕该国防洪项目的腐败指控可能会进一步拖累股市。【原文：Philippine Stock Exchange President and Chief Executive Officer Ramon Monzon said the corruption allegations surrounding the country’s flood-control projects may weigh further on the stock market.】

item.title: 塔塔资本开始接受 17 亿美元 IPO 订单，这是印度今年最大的 IPO
item.description: 塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd. ）准备开始接受首次公开募股的订单，这次募股可能会募集到多达 1,550 亿卢比（合 17 亿美元）的资金，这是印度今年同类交易中最大的一笔，也将使印度炙手可热的首次公开募股市场迎来创纪录的一个月。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. is poised to start taking orders for an initial public offering that may raise as much as 155 billion rupees ($1.7 billion), India’s biggest deal of its kind this year, and putting the country’s hot IPO market on course for a record month.】

item.title: 澳大利亚与巴布亚新几内亚签署防务条约遏制中国影响
item.description: 澳大利亚与北部邻国巴布亚新几内亚签署了联合防御条约，堪培拉正努力遏制中国在该地区的影响力。【原文：Australia and northern neighbor Papua New Guinea signed a joint defense pact, as Canberra pushes to curb China’s influence in the region.】

item.title: 香港证监会主席梁振英据称将连任三年
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港证券及期货事务监察委员会（Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission）主席梁凤仪（Julia Leung）将连任三年。【原文：Julia Leung is set to be given another three-year term as head of the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高市贸易 "再起，日本国防和科技股攀升
item.description: 支持刺激政策的保守派高市真奈赢得大选，有望成为日本下一任首相，市场猜测日本国防和科技股将从更多的政府支出中获益，因此股价飙升。【原文：Japanese defense and tech shares soared on speculation they’ll benefit from more government spending after the election win of the pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi positions her to become the nation’s next prime minister.】

item.title: 比特币周日突破 125,000 美元后徘徊在历史记录附近
item.description: 比特币周日创下了自 8 月中旬以来的新纪录，这是因为美国政府关门促使投资者转向避险资产，这被称为 "贬值交易"。【原文：Bitcoin set a fresh record on Sunday for the first time since mid-August, as the US government shutdown drove investors to safe-haven assets in a migration dubbed the “debasement trade.”】

item.title: 高市获胜利好股市，可能拖累日元：策略师
item.description: 据策略师称，日本下任首相高市真奈可能会因支持刺激计划而提振股市情绪，但她的宽松货币政策立场可能会拖累日元。【原文：Japan’s likely next prime minister Sanae Takaichi will boost equity sentiment due to her pro-stimulus plans, but her easy monetary policy stance may weigh on the yen, according to strategists.】

item.title: Insight 旗下 Veeam 收购 Securiti 交易接近 18 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Veeam 软件公司正在就以约 18 亿美元收购数据隐私管理软件制造商 Securiti 进行深入谈判。【原文：Veeam Software is in advanced talks to buy data privacy management software maker Securiti for about $1.8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称前行长奥尔将获得非竞争性报酬
item.description: 新西兰央行表示，前行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）在截至 3 月份辞职的九个月内将获得总计 118 万新西兰元（约合 69 万美元）的薪酬。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank said former governor Adrian Orr will be paid a total of NZ$1.18 million ($690,000) for the nine months through March, when he resigned.】

item.title: 美国政府继续关门，黄金再创新高
item.description: 本周初，黄金再次创下历史新高，这得益于美国停摆拖累下的避险情绪。【原文：Gold hit another record high at the start of the week, benefiting from a flight to safety as the US shutdown drags on.】

item.title: 创纪录涨势后，越南即将面临富时指数决定
item.description: 越南即将实现其被富时罗素（FTSE Russell）提升为新兴市场的长期目标，尽管这一里程碑可能不会进一步推动今年股市的大幅上涨。【原文：Vietnam is on the cusp of achieving its longtime goal of being upgraded to emerging-market status by FTSE Russell, though the milestone may do little to further bolster this year’s blistering stock rally.】

item.title: 高市获胜后，日本股市上涨，日元下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在执政党投票将支持刺激政策的立法者佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）定位为该国下一任领导人后，日元下跌。东京股市早盘有望上涨。【原文：The Japanese yen dropped after a ruling-party vote positioned pro-stimulus lawmaker Sanae Takaichi to become the country’s next leader. Tokyo shares are poised for gains in early trading.】

item.title: 交易商加大降息押注，奇异果跌势看似远未结束
item.description: 随着市场为央行从本周开始的一系列降息措施做好准备，新西兰元将遭受更多痛苦。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar is set to suffer more pain as markets brace for a string of interest-rate cuts from the central bank starting this week.】

item.title: 欧佩克+（OPEC+）达成温和增产协议，石油止跌回升
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）及其盟国同意在下个月适度提高产量，避免了交易商对超大规模增产的担忧，此后石油开盘走高。【原文：Oil opened higher after OPEC and its allies agreed to raise production by a modest amount next month, staving off traders’ fears of a super-sized quota increase.】

item.title: 米莱候选人因与毒贩有牵连而退出竞选
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）再次遭遇挫折，因为在中期选举前三周，他的一位盟友因腐败指控而退出党内高层，这有可能削弱这位市场友好型领导人在关键投票中的支持率。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei suffered another setback as an ally dropped off the top of his party’s ticket just three weeks before a midterm election amid corruption allegations that threatened to sap support for the market-friendly leader in the crucial vote.】

item.title: 好莱坞已经在人工智能视频方面落后了
item.description:
娱乐行业希望避免重蹈互联网诞生之初的覆辙。【原文：

The entertainment industry wants to avoid a repeat of what happened at the dawn of the internet.

】

item.title: 新西兰银行家敦促新西兰央行进一步提出更宽松的资本建议
item.description: 一个银行业游说团体认为，新西兰央行应进一步放宽资本要求。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank should go further with its proposals to ease capital requirements, according to a banking industry lobby group.】

item.title: 热爱法拉利的交易员以 1.1 万分之 1 的杠杆率押注债券，烧毁了华尔街
item.description:
花旗集团和 MUFG 是受 26 亿美元交易影响的公司之一，该交易目前是伦敦诉讼的核心，引发了对客户支票的质疑

。【原文：

Citigroup and MUFG were among the firms stung by $2.6 billion trade that’s now at the heart of a London lawsuit, raising questions about client checks

】

item.title: 比亚迪的 "天轨 "项目是电动汽车巨头罕见的失误
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司创始人王传福尝试过很多事情。生产电池、制造电子产品，以及最近比亚迪最著名的电动汽车。但十多年来，他还一直在尝试建立另一项事业--单轨铁路网，以同时解决交通拥堵和碳排放问题。【原文：Wang Chuanfu, the founder of BYD Co., has tried his hand at many things. Producing batteries, making electronics and most recently, what BYD is famous for, electric vehicles. But for more than a decade, he’s also been attempting to build out another enterprise — a monorail network to solve the problems of congestion and carbon emissions at the same time.】

item.title: Firefly Aerospace 达成收购 SciTec.Inc：M&A 公司快照
item.description: Firefly Aerospace 表示，该公司已达成最终协议，将以约 8.55 亿美元的现金和股票收购 SciTec。【原文：Firefly Aerospace says it entered into a definitive agreement to acquire SciTec for approximately $855 million in cash and stock.】

item.title: 阿根廷人海外购物挥霍数十亿美元，引发货币危机
item.description:
阿根廷人跨境疯狂购物，使米莱伊政府在努力支撑比索的同时损失数十亿美元

。【原文：

Argentines are going on cross-border shopping sprees, costing Milei's government billions as it tries to prop up the peso

】

item.title: 高市获胜后日元下跌，日本股市或受提振
item.description: 日本股市和长期国债收益率可能会在周一开盘时上涨，此前执政党投票结果显示支持刺激政策的立法者佐那江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）将成为下一任首相。日元兑美元走软。【原文：Japanese stocks and long-term government bond yields will likely rise when markets open on Monday, after a ruling-party vote positioned pro-stimulus lawmaker Sanae Takaichi to become the next prime minister. The yen was indicated weaker against the dollar.】

item.title: 债券交易员敢于在 4% 收益率消失前做多
item.description: 今年以来，债券投资者利用美联储降息和美国短期收益率下跌的有利时机，大获全胜。【原文：Bond investors have ridden a profitable playbook this year to score big wins on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts and tumbling short-term US yields.】

item.title: 绿党波兰斯基为英国财富税提出 "爱国 "理由
item.description: 英国绿党新任领导人扎克-波兰斯基（Zack Polanski）表示，他希望挑战右翼对爱国主义的 "垄断"，并提出了吸引对首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党感到失望的左翼英国人的目标。【原文：The UK Green Party’s new leader Zack Polanski said he wants to challenge the right-wing’s “monopoly” on patriotism, as he set out his bid to attract left-leaning Britons disillusioned by Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s Labour Party.】
